summary: A very small mod that adds 8 powerful drugs you can create at cookpots.
descriptionHtml:
A very small mod that adds 8 powerful drugs you can create at cookpots. Each drug has its own effects such as fortifying stamina and damaging stamina regen. You can buy a basic vial of Adrenaline and basic recipe from a merchant in Belethor\'s goods. This merchant also has 20,000 gold available to barter general goods if you want to.

Install to your Skyrim data folder.
author: Oblivionmod7
